answers.text:
Attached is an an analysis conducted by the City of Costa Mesa, California in 2009.  They focused on the cost effectiveness of contracting out street cleaning services.  I know it isn't exactly what you are looking for but it may be a starting point.
I hope this helps.

author: Francis Frobel
text:
Good afternoon:
has any municipality recently performed a cost-benefit analysis for street sweeping services. In particular have you tried to determine whether it would be more cost effective to contract out street sweeping versus purchase a new street sweeper? Would you be willing to share your work with me to help me start this process. Thank you, Fran Frobel
title: Cost-benefit analysis for street sweeping services
